item.title: [Quick] Connection
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“stewie0888, post:1, topic:379038”]How do I allow any Client to connect to my Server?

            clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
            serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
int UID = inStream.readDWord();
if(UID == 0) {
disconnected = true;
//saveFile = false;
return;

How can I allow any UID to connect, or How can I find the UID of a webclient?[/quote]

Signlink.java Client sided

item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

How do I allow any Client to connect to my Server?

            clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
            serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
int UID = inStream.readDWord();
if(UID == 0) {
disconnected = true;
//saveFile = false;
return;

How can I allow any UID to connect, or How can I find the UID of a webclient?
